# WidgetFamily.systemExtraLargePortrait

**Case**

An extra-large widget that uses a portrait orientation.

## Declaration

```swift
case systemExtraLargePortrait
```

## Discussion

The `systemExtraLargePortrait` widget family is only available to visionOS apps. To add an extra-large visionOS widget to a compatible iOS and iPadOS app, use the `systemExtraLarge` widget family. The extra-large widget appears in a portrait orientation, similar to the [doc://com.apple.WidgetKit/documentation/WidgetKit/WidgetFamily/systemExtraLargePortrait] widget of a visionOS app.

## Accessing system families

- **WidgetFamily.systemSmall**: A small widget.
- **WidgetFamily.systemMedium**: A medium-sized widget.
- **WidgetFamily.systemLarge**: A large widget.
- **WidgetFamily.systemExtraLarge**: An extra-large widget.
title: WidgetFamily.systemExtraLargePortrait
